Prev: Sledding Up: Spring Break in Mammoth Next: Coso Junction, I

Boron



On the way back to Irvine, we stopped for lunch at a diner at the junction of 395 and 58, near Boron.
The field across the road was full of electrical equipment. Somewhere around here, it started to rain.
Taken Thursday, March 28, 2002, 12:29:36pm.  Original image size: 1600x1200, 1.0Mb
Technical details: Olympus C700UZ, 1/1000s @ F3.5, ISO 100, 246mm
PS6 Auto Contrast, USM 20:20 - 100:0.5
